Level 48
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 48
By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 10:21 pm:

Stage 48

When you start, go and destroy the box just beneath you. After that free the naga and quickly create a box to jump back to your starting position(the metal block.) The naga will fall into the pit, and you will have to go to the left part of the screen. Grab the key. Go down. Free the naga again. Once you reached this part, you would have to be fast. Create a box beneath/right of you when you are standing on the metal block. Beneath you would be naga. Jump down when the naga is turning to the left. If you are quick enough you would turn left while you jump and crouch just when you land, hence, destroying the box in which the naga will stand on, and it will fall to the lowest level.

When this is done, quickly rush to the end of the stage before the naga chases you, and victory is yours.
